item.title: How to make items cost pk points. WILL REP++ [PI]
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

in data/cfg/items you can only add items bonuses

to change points price you have go to shopAssitand
and do like this

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case itemID: case itemID: return 200;// it Coast 200 points

Also you gonna see here void knight arrmor cuz they coast points to so add items what you gonna exchange for pk points

Case itemID: means ur item exaple case 1305: //d long id
return 50: //D long coast 50 points
return 200; means how item point price so id you add it to pk shopt it will coast 200 pkpoints also you can change it to 35 points 1000 points etc…

If you get any error compiling problem post here i will help

Read full topic

item.title: How to make items cost pk points. WILL REP++ [PI]
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

i can explain very good cuz my english bad but i can psot you codes what i using for my server
src\server\model\shops
All codes shuld be added to shopAssistant.java

Search for:
public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){
Add this

} if (c.myShopId == Ur shop id here) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " pk points"); return; }

After this you shold add special item value price like armadyl godsword coast 500 points

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case itemID: case itemID: return 200;// it Coast 200 points you Can also change it

Next adding to shop special value

public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) { if (c.myShopId == 17) { if (c.pkpoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.pkpoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough points to buy this item."); }

I Hope helped you

Read full topic
